replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
呵, 只修理了兩隻蟲, 後頭大概還會有更新吧...

Bug Fixes:
    Shift-clicking into a full chest/inventory crashing the game was fixed.
    Shift-clicking items in and out of a dispenser crashing the game fixed.

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: 自从1.5 shiftclick东西进射箭器都是crash~ mojang啊~
